scripts.cdk:destroy: npm run cdk -- destroy --all --role-arn=arn:aws:iam::$(aws sts get-caller-identity --query 'Account' --output text):role/TrainingCloudformationRole
scripts.cdk:deploy: npm run cdk -- deploy --all --role-arn=arn:aws:iam::$(aws sts get-caller-identity --query 'Account' --output text):role/TrainingCloudformationRole
